name: Catch-All
description:
What will you do when you mistakenly get an oversized fish delivery? Throw the fish to the giant cat in the alley outside your apartment, obviously! Eat as many fish as you can without choking the bones! Best played in full screen, can only be played with mouse and keyboard.

Made solo in under 48 hours for the Global StartupCities Game Jam in November of 2020.

The in-browser version seems to work just fine, but if you have any issues, I've also provided PC standalone downloads.

Controls

WASD / arrow keys : 🐈 move cat 🐈

Left click : 🐟 throw fish 🐟

Right click (held): recover/remove fish

Escape: ⏸pause/unpause⏸
